name: QxMaven
body:
[Qooxdoo]: http://qooxdoo.org
[qooxdoo-maven-parent]:https://github.com/salmon-charles/qooxdoo-maven
[qooxdoo-maven-sdk]:http://search.maven.org/#search|ga|1|a%3A%22qooxdoo-sdk%22
[qooxdoo-maven-plugin]:https://github.com/salmon-charles/qooxdoo-maven-plugin
[qooxdoo-archetype-desktop]:https://github.com/salmon-charles/qooxdoo-archetype-desktop

# Overview

QxMaven aims to provide a complete solution for developing web applications by using the [Qooxdoo] Javascript framework and Maven.

The project is composed of several maven artifacts:
* The [qooxdoo-maven-parent] is the parent pom; it contains general informations on project, global properties,… All artifacts inherits from it
* The [qooxdoo-maven-sdk] provides a single package which contains the entire framework, including the web tools to help in development (API viewer, unit test, inspector, …)
* The [qooxdoo-maven-plugin] allows maven to compile, optimize, and test your qooxdoo application
* The [qooxdoo-archetype-desktop] provides a skeleton project for quick starting the development of a qooxdoo desktop application (RIA)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Web development with Qooxdoo, powered by Maven
